resources.string: Send: Configure the new data into HotKnot Servce and send to remote side\r\n Send by Callback: Send Beam me up! + Beam time \r\n Disable: Disable HotKnot callback. No data to send

Send: Configure the new file path and send to remote side if the HotKnot is detected\r\n Send by Callback: Configure the new file path if the HotKnot is detected and send it to the remote side\r\n Disable: Disable HotKnot callback. No data to send
